This will be done as in view of the current tasks of protection against Russian aggression and based on the long -term protection of the borders of our country after this war.

With suchThe statement made March 12President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

"I agreed on further steps for the development of the State Border Service of Ukraine and, accordingly, the border troops," said Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

He also noted the units and warriors of the border troops who showed themselves these weeks and months. In particular, the border guards of the Sumy detachment, which counteract Russian sabotage and strengthen our defensive positions at the border.

AsThe ArmyInform reported earlier, Sumy's authorities have denied rumors that the Russians are preparing a large offensive territory of the region.
